name: Muhammad Rayhan
title: Full-Stack Developer & Student of AI
bio: I began learning programming as a Computing student in Secondary 3. Since then, I have developed a strong passion for coding, and eventually found my dream job as an AI engineer. Through EAE, I was able to join Nanyang Polytechnic's Diploma in Applied AI and Analytics course, where I am currently in my first year of study. I am excited to continue my journey in the field of AI and work towards achieving my career goals.
